other_tests.findings: Necrotizing granulomas centered on small airways with extensive necrosis and dystrophic calcifications. Staining revealed fragmented varicose hyphae suggestive of Aspergillus.
other_tests.changes_over_time: During the course of treatment, the patient's condition deteriorated, and no further specific findings from the biopsy were noted after the initial examination.

other_tests.findings: Acid-fast bacilli staining did not reveal acid-fast bacilli.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Additional gastric aspirates showed no acid-fast bacilli and cultures were pending.

other_tests.findings: Abnormal oxidative burst activity; the fluorescence response was lower than that of normal neutrophils.
